biotools.summary:
Computationally identifying hot spots in protein-DNA binding interfaces using an ensemble approach.

Prediction of Protein-DNA Binding Energy Hot Spots.

PreHots, a computational method that can effectively identify hot spots on protein-DNA binding interfaces using an ensemble approach.
